verses.text: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens.

Behold, as the eyes of servants \add look\add* unto the hand of their masters, \add And\add* as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; So our eyes \add wait\add* upon the \sc Lord\sc* our God, Until that he have mercy upon us.
Have mercy upon us, O \sc Lord\sc*, have mercy upon us: For we are exceedingly filled \add with\add* contempt.
Our soul is exceedingly filled \add With\add* the scorning of those that are at ease, \add And with\add* the contempt of the proud.
